conversation.message:
Hi Parent_E—happy to help you prepare so there’s no delay if we’re able to move to the next family in priority order in round 10.

For a round-10 [APPLY], please include the following “ready-to-finalize” checklist information:
1) Child’s full name + exact DOB
2) Preferred start date (earliest possible and any constraints)
3) Attendance pattern needed (full-time/part-time) and drop-off/pick-up window within our hours
4) Parent/guardian names, contact details, and emergency contact
5) Any allergies/medical considerations + any support needs we should plan for
6) Confirmation you can complete enrollment paperwork and pay any required deposit/fees within 24 hours of an offer

Documents (you can have these ready; we’ll request them immediately upon acceptance):
- Immunization record (or exemption documentation if applicable)
- Proof of identity for guardian and child (as required by local policy)
- Any custody/guardianship documents if relevant
- Completed intake form (I can send our standard intake template upon request—tell me the best email to send it to)

Process note: as mentioned, we will reassess at round 10 if we have not finalized with any higher-priority applicant by then. If that happens and you submit your [APPLY] in round 10 with the above details, we can move very quickly.

If you’d like, reply with the best email address for the intake template and I’ll share the checklist/form right away.

Hi Parent_E—thank you for submitting the full ready-to-finalize application right at the start of round 10.

We have reassessed this round and we’re able to offer you our available place at Nursery_C.

Next steps to finalize (within 24 hours):
1) Please reply confirming you accept the place.
2) We will send the secure card link or bank transfer details for the refundable enrollment deposit (one week of tuition), along with the final enrollment packet.
3) Once deposit and paperwork are received, we will confirm your child’s start date.

[ACCEPT]
